name: Jessé Alves Galdino
body:
## RESUME
Software Engineer with 5 years of experience with systems developed with PHP and Python.
I also execute some infrastructure work in Unix systems like Debian, CentOs and Ubuntu.

## EMPLOYMENT HISTORY
Job experience as a software and database engineer and with team leadership.

### Software Engineer at [Hi-Mídia - Grupo RBS] [himidia] (February 2011 - Present)
Working as software engineer, backend and frontend developer and using [SCRUM] [scrum] as work methodology.

##### System to manage clients and products
Working as software engineer, backend and frontend developer in 5 member team.

techs: [PHP] [php], [Python] [Python], [Symfony 1] [symfony1], [PHPunit] [phpunit], [Mockery] [mockery], [Composer] [composer], [MySQL] [mysql], [Bower] [bower], [Javascript] [javascript], [Jquery] [jquery], [JqueryUI] [jqueryui], [Composer] [composer], [Scrum] [scrum], [UML] [uml] and [GIT] [git]

##### E-mail Marketing Database Administration
Working as software engineer, API architect and developer.  
  
techs: [PHP] [php], [Python] [Python], [WSSE] [wsse], [JSON] [json], [Symfony] [symfony], [UML] [uml], [GIT] [git] and [Composer] [composer]

### Programmer at [Elike] [elike] (September 2011 - January 2012)
Worked as a backend and frontend developer at [Meu Shopping] [meushopping].

techs: [Facebook API] [facebook], [PHP] [php], [GIT] [git], [HTML] [html], [CSS] [css] and [Javascript] [javascript] 

### Programmer at **i9ERA** (June 2011 - October 2011)
Worked as a backend and frontend developer.

techs: [PHP] [php], [GIT] [git], [Zend Framework] [zend], [HTML] [html], [CSS] [css] and [Javascript] [javascript] 

### Programmer at [Ability Soluções] [ability] (September 2010 - February 2011)
Worked as a backend and frontend developer.

techs: [PHP] [php], [SVN] [svn], [Symfony 1] [symfony1], [HTML] [html], [CSS] [css] and [Javascript] [javascript]

## SKILLS // TOOLS

### Python
[Python] [python], [Django] [django], [Tornado] [tornado] and [Flask] [flask]

### PHP
[PHP] [php], [Composer] [composer], [Symfony] [symfony], [Mockery] [mockery] and [PHPunit] [phpunit]

### Frontend Developer
[HTML] [html], [HTML5] [html5], [CSS] [css], [CSS3] [css3], [Javascript] [javascript],[Jquery] [jquery], [Twitter Bootstrap] [twitterbootstrap], [Bower] [bower] and [JqueryUI] [jqueryui]

### Others
[Facebook API] [facebook], [Apache] [apache], [GIT] [git], [MySql] [mysql], [SCRUM] [scrum] and [UML] [uml]

## EDUCATION

Microsoft Specialist: Programming in HTML5 with JavaScript and CSS3 Specialist  
    
System analysis at [UniverCidade] [univercidade] - Centro universitário da cidade (2009 - on hold)
